{"id":1830828791,"question_id":4112,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 days, 22 hours","timestamp":1763260311,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"25 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1830828791/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximize Expression of Three Elements","memory":"31.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maximizeExpressionOfThree(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        int ans = -INT_MAX;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            for (int j=i+1; j<N; j++) {\n                for (int k=j+1; k<N; k++) {\n                    ans = max(ans, nums[i] + nums[j] - nums[k]);\n                    ans = max(ans, nums[i] - nums[j] + nums[k]);\n                    ans = max(ans, - nums[i] + nums[j] + nums[k]);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximize-expression-of-three-elements","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1359}
